hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select missc.job_id, missc.cust_wh_code, missc.cust_wh_name, missc.customer_code, missc.customer_name, missc.site_code, missc.site_name, missc.status, missc.plant_id, missc.wh_code, missc.IS_LATTER_SUBWAREHOUSE, missc.wh_name from MID_SITE_WH_CONTROL missc where 1=1 and missc.status=0 <<and missc.job_id=:jobId>> <<and missc.cust_wh_code=:custWhCode>> <<AND missc.cust_wh_name LIKE '%' ||:custWhName || '%'>> <<and missc.customer_code=:customerCode>> <<and missc.site_code=:siteCode>> <<and missc.plant_id=:plantId>> <<and missc.wh_code=:whCode>>
